org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.languages.cpp.codegen.utils

Interface ILocateCppProject


  • public interface ILocateCppProject

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getTargetFile() 
      org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getTargetProject(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.PackageableElement pe, boolean createIfMissing)
      Locate and return the target project for the given packageable element.

    • Method Detail

      • getTargetProject

        org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getTargetProject(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.PackageableElement pe,
                                                     boolean createIfMissing)
        Locate and return the target project for the given packageable element. Return null if no target project can be found. Ensures that the target project is correctly setup to contain generated C/C++ code. Does not create a new project, but may modify existing ones.
        Parameters:
        pe - a packageable element within a model
        createIfMissing - if true, ask the user to apply the C++ nature if required.
        Returns:
        the associated project, if the C++ nature is applied.

      • getTargetFile

        org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getTargetFile()
